HelpPage.ldjson.name: HeyTCM Help Center
HelpPage.ldjson.description: Find answers to common questions, user guides, and support resources for HeyTCM.

HelpPage.faqs.question: How does the HeyTCM Smart Ring monitor Qi and blood status?
HelpPage.faqs.answer: The HeyTCM Smart Ring uses high-precision optical sensors to monitor pulse waveform, skin temperature, and microcirculation. Combined with proprietary TCM models and machine learning, these signals are translated into Qi and blood assessments from a TCM perspective. The ring collects data 24/7 and analyzes trends to provide you with personalized health insights.

HelpPage.faqs.question: How do I register a HeyTCM account?
HelpPage.faqs.answer: Registering is simple: 1. Visit our website or download the HeyTCM App; 2. Click 'Register'; 3. Enter your email and set a password; 4. Verify your email; 5. Complete your profile (including basic health info for more accurate advice). Once registered, you can use all free features and optionally purchase premium services.

HelpPage.faqs.question: How does HeyTCM protect my health data privacy?
HelpPage.faqs.answer: HeyTCM takes privacy seriously: 1. All data is end-to-end encrypted in transit and storage; 2. You control data sharingâ€”by default, only you can view your data; 3. Research data is anonymized; 4. We follow strict security protocols and comply with international standards; 5. We never sell your data without your explicit consent. You can view, download, or delete your data anytime in privacy settings.

HelpPage.faqs.question: How long is the Smart Ring battery life? How do I charge it?
HelpPage.faqs.answer: The HeyTCM C1 Smart Ring lasts about 7 days per charge under normal use. To charge, simply place it in the included charging case, which uses magnetic alignment. The case itself charges via USB-C and can fully recharge the ring about 3 times. Charging from empty to full takes about 2 hours. The app will remind you to charge when the battery drops below 20%.

HelpPage.faqs.question: How can I participate in the HeyTCM community?
HelpPage.faqs.answer: The HeyTCM community is an open, friendly platform: 1. Log in to your HeyTCM account; 2. Click the 'Community' tab in the app or website; 3. Browse discussions or start a new topic; 4. Follow the rules and share your experience. Please do not share private information or treat community discussions as medical advice.

HelpPage.faqs.question: How do I reset my password if I forget it?
HelpPage.faqs.answer: If you forget your password: 1. Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page; 2. Enter your registered email; 3. Click 'Send Reset Link'; 4. Click the link in your email; 5. Set a new password. If you don't receive the email, check your spam folder or contact support.

HelpPage.faqs.question: What should I do if I find a security vulnerability?
HelpPage.faqs.answer: HeyTCM values security and welcomes responsible disclosure. If you find a vulnerability: 1. Contact our security team at security@heytcm.com; 2. Provide details and steps to reproduce; 3. Do not disclose the issue publicly until fixed; 4. Allow us time to resolve it. We offer rewards for valid reports.
